document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Falsehood </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Thee, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">suppose </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">'Twould </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">undermine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Sill </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Faith </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">pinned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Block </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Block </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Cedar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Citadel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Falsehood of thee could I suppose
